review.author: DevOps
findings: M4: desired-state recovery model with exponential backoff auto-restart on unexpected worker exit
Race condition handling: restartInFlightPromise single-flight gate prevents concurrent restart attempts
Backoff math correct: base * 2^(attempt-1) capped at max, reset on success
Intentional stop cleanly cancels timers, resets state, desiredRunning=false is authoritative signal
ensureRunning in send APIs bounded — one attempt per call, no infinite retry loop
No resource leaks — clearRestartTimer called in all exit paths, promise cleared via .finally()
M2/M3 compatible — queue persistence survives restart, delivery-check stateless per-request

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
